body:
Day 40 - 968*
Everything was bad, other than that one panel at page nineteen that could have been in Baki. I can already see Yuujiro using this technique on Baki, the name would be "thought breaker", by hitting his son on the head, the Ogre would make it so that the child's(?) brain keeps pingpoing from one side of the cranium to another giving him a concession.
1/10.
